name: Blubberhill
description: blubbery-ist hill on the island, no competition.

description: Even better than Splorgon 4!

description: Wow, I didn't know intangible concepts from the internet could freeze like that!

description: Uh-oh, what happens here??

description: Hugs… hugs *everywhere*

description: Debatably cringe.

description: HRRRUUURRRRRRRRRNGHHHH

description: Every summit needs a visitor center.

description: Riddle me this!

description: MAXIMUM EXTREMITY!!!!

description: If only these walls could talk… and like, they almost can!

description: Really? $35 for a mug?

description: Oooh, this place really really hopes it didn't do anything to cause Mount Unhappiness…

name: Anti-Ireland
description: Whatever it is, it ain't Ireland.

name: Mildly Angry Mountains
description: Sometimes nature just kinda pisses you off, yknow?!

name: The Land of Obese Plants
description: Ferns should not be that… plump.

name: Crab Rave
description: Awww yiss, get those claws up

name: Toetree Forest
description: If you taken any photos here, do *not* share them on slack.

name: The Opinion Dominion
description: Nobody asked, okay?

name: http://island
description: In the before time, this island once hosted the long-destroyed Geo-City

name: Sconehenge
description: It looks ancient, and rather stale.

name: Bigloo Island
description: Originally called "Big Igloo Island", but the name got shortened at some point.

name: Just a Real Nice Pond
description: It's got a view of the mountain and everything… wow. There couldn't possibly be anything nefarious about it!

name: Western Upside-Down Island
description: Reputedly even more upside-down than the eastern half.

name: The Big Island
description: Everything here is real big!! Like, REALLY big. Holy **** that thing is HUGE what even is that?!

name: Cantada
description: Why even try, eh?

name: Island Island
description: Just your generic island. You cannot get more classically "island" than this.

name: The Discouraged Sector
description: About 30% less off-limits as the Forbidden Sector.

name: Abandoned Polar Bear Breeding Operation
description: I'm sorry, they were breeding them to do WHAT??

name: The Bridge on the River Shy
description: No… don't look at the river :[ it does not like attention :((

name: The Frozen Tomb
description: This one's real cold! Which is good, considering what's inside.

name: Cringe Canyon
description: Oh, god, oof… it's honestly hard just to look at it.

name: Le Dumpstairè II
description: This is where Heidi Croft and Explorpheus Jones began their island journey when their ship got beached

name: The Far Northeast Extremity
description: A desolate wasteland with ABSOLUTELY NOTHING HIDDEN IN IT WINK WINK

name: Dilapidated Negative Emotion Factory
description: The ruins of this ancient facility seem to be leaking into the surrounding environment.

name: A Hole in the Ground Where Elvis Presley is Definitely Not Hiding
description: I mean, he's dead… right?

name: The Sea of Glub
description: It's like one of those inland seas.

name: Eastern Upside-Down Island
description: Woah, is that tree *upside-down*?

name: DDoouubblleettoowwnn
description: GGeett ddoouubblleedd!!

name: Splorgon 4
description: Superseded by Splorgon 5. Best left shunned and uninhabited.

name: Isle of the Riddle Second
description: Okay, you got that one… but what about THIS riddle??

name: Singletown
description: Before there could be DDoouubblleettoowwnn… there had to be a Singletown.

name: The Ugly Isles
description: Honestly, they just aren't very attractive.

name: Menacing Earthworks
description: I bet some highly-esteemed deed is commemorated here!

name: Trollcave
description: Beware of rickrolls.

name: Node 45
description: Description for Scene 45

name: Ravine Tomb Bottom Entrance
description: This is where Heidi and Explorpheus made their daring balloon escape

name: Wetwater Lake
description: You won't believe how wet the water here is!

name: Pumice & Hummus
description: Exactly what it sounds like.

name: Stinkfoot Island
description: This island has no relation to that Frank Zappa song. Or does it?

name: Cringe Plateau
description: The height of cringe

name: Mount Miniscule Summit
description: This absolutely enormous mountain is named for Sir George Miniscule, who—fun fact—never even saw the mountain.

name: A Tomb of Grass and Giggles
description: Giggles? In a tomb? How unusual!

name: Imaginary Sandcastle
description: Despite what it looks like, this enormous sandcastle is a figment of your imagination.

name: Hotland
description: Legends say it is hot here. The reality is much more mysterious.

name: The Forest of Many Tree-Like Things That Are Not Actually Trees
description: They may look like trees at first… but they aren't.

name: Los Árboles de la Estupidez
description: Hurr durr imma tree /°o°\

name: Ghost Rave
description: What's that song that goes BOO-BOO-BOO-BOO-TOMB BOO-BOO-BOO BOO-BOO-BOO-TOMB BOO-BOO-BOO-BOO TOMB

name: Wigglebutt Woods
description: Home of the wigglebutts

name: Elephant's Butt Glacier
description: Wow, that glacier looks remarkably like a… well, just look for yourself.

name: The Swole Hole
description: GRRRAAAHHHH GET SWOLE

name: Pair o' Dice
description: Not to be confused with paradise.

name: The Shellfish Kingdom
description: Oh my god… it's like Ant Fugue, but with mollusks!!!

name: The Great Pyramids of Sneeza
description: ACHOO!

name: Big Dune
description: Holy moses and mackerel, that is a REALLY big dune!!

name: The Forbidden Sector
description: DO NOT GO HERE.

name: Spooky Tomb
description: This is where Heidi and Explorpheus discovered their first tomb!

name: The Sandy Swallow Islands
description: PTUAH. Ptuah! Ugh, who would have thought swallowing sand is so unpleasant??

name: Mount Miniscule Based Camp
description: BASED camp, not base camp. Common mistake.

name: The Best of All Possible Snowdrifts
description: Once you see it, you'll understand why it's better than literally all the other snowdrifts.

name: A Supremely Uncomfortable Place
description: Oh, lordy, it's so awkward here! And it's too hot. Can we leave?

name: B.L.O.R.T.
description: Wonder what that stands for?

name: The River Glub
description: It makes a curious glubbing sound, which is your first clue to unraveling its enduring mysteries…

name: The Great Frozen Wall
description: It's gonna blow your mind when you figure out the clever trick this remarkable structure uses to keep the cold at bay.

name: Spanky's
description: Welcome to Spanky's. Would you like to roll the dice?

name: Flavortown
description: Oh my god, I thought that obnoxious guy on the food network was just making it up!!

name: Disappointment Island
description: It's just… so disappointing.

name: Weird Red Bumpy Area
description: It's just so… red and bumpy. What's up with that?

name: Ominous Blurtzing Sound
description: Hey, what is making that ominous blurtzing sound?

name: Ancient Insult Trading Post
description: Ancient peoples would gather here to trade ancient insults.

name: The Parting of the Mountain Waters
description: We love a good continental divide

name: Boom Boom Tomb
description: What's that booming noise?

name: The Island That Tries to Bite You
description: AHHHH IT'S TRYING TO BITE ME

name: Pantsified Peninsula
description: Oh god, it's like the whole place has been… pantsified.

name: Mount Unhappiness
description: That frown is gonna have to return to its right-side-up state.

name: Lost Realm of the Praksadonskalisks
description: What's a praksadonskalisk? Guess you'll have to visit to find out.

name: Fancy-Plants Forest
description: These plants be fancy af.

name: Pointy Dunes
description: Pointy sand makes for pointy dunes.

name: Anti-Anti-Ireland
description: Whatever it is, it ain't Anti-Ireland.

name: The Shores of Sorrow
description: u won't believe how this place got its name, it jus so saaad 😭😭😭

name: Prancy-Plants Peninsula
description: These plants be prancy af.

name: Shrubs of Mystery
description: Oh my god, what could they be hiding??

name: Ancient Starbucks
description: Conveniently equipped with a primitive boat-thru!

name: The Scene of the Crime
description: Crime? On the shores of such a lovely little tidal estuary??

name: Cactusland
description: Guess what this place has a lot of?

name: Isle of the Riddle Third
description: A smartypants, eh?? Well, this third riddle is IMPOSSIBLE!!

name: Sandtopia
description: Wow. What an incredible place to be a sand!!

name: Realm of the Triangular Trees
description: These trees are triangular at levels never even seen before, it's unbelievable!

name: Porple Point
description: Porplier than your average point. What's left of it, anyway.

name: The Silly Silly Hilly Silly Hills
description: THREE sillies? Wow.
